Fast Food Restaurant.english: 1. I love eating burgers and fries.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Adoro mangiare hamburger e patatine fritte.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: Me encanta comer hamburguesas y papas fritas.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Ich liebe es, Burger und Pommes zu essen.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 2. Can I have a cheeseburger, please?
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Posso avere un cheeseburger, per favore?
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: ¿Puedo tener una hamburguesa con queso, por favor?
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Kann ich bitte einen Cheeseburger haben?

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 3. The fast food restaurant is always busy.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Il ristorante fast food è sempre affollato.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: El restaurante de comida rápida siempre está ocupado.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Das Fast-Food-Restaurant ist immer voll.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 4. I usually order a soda with my meal.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Di solito ordino una bibita con il pasto.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: Normalmente pido un refresco con mi comida.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Ich bestelle normalerweise ein Getränk zu meiner Mahlzeit.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 5. Do you want to go to a fast food place for lunch?
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Vuoi andare in un fast food per pranzo?
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: ¿Quieres ir a un lugar de comida rápida para almorzar?
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Möchtest du zum Mittagessen in ein Fast-Food-Restaurant gehen?

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 6. The chicken nuggets are delicious.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: I nuggets di pollo sono deliziosi.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: Los nuggets de pollo están deliciosos.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Die Hühnernuggets sind köstlich.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 7. I'm craving some french fries right now.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Adesso ho voglia di patatine fritte.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: Ahora mismo me antojo unas papas fritas.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Ich habe gerade Lust auf Pommes.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 8. Fast food is not very healthy.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Il cibo fast food non è molto salutare.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: La comida rápida no es muy saludable.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Fast Food ist nicht sehr gesund.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 9. Can I get a take-out order, please?
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Posso avere un ordine da asporto, per favore?
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: ¿Puedo pedir para llevar, por favor?
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Kann ich bitte eine Bestellung zum Mitnehmen bekommen?

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 10. The fast food industry is growing rapidly.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: L'industria del fast food sta crescendo rapidamente.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: La industria de comida rápida está creciendo rápidamente.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Die Fast-Food-Branche wächst schnell.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 11. I'm on a diet, so I avoid fast food.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Sono a dieta, quindi evito il fast food.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: Estoy a dieta, así que evito la comida rápida.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Ich bin auf Diät, deshalb meide ich Fast Food.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 12. The drive-thru line is always long.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: La fila del drive-thru è sempre lunga.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: La fila de autoservicio siempre es larga.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Die Schlange am Drive-In ist immer lang.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 13. Fast food restaurants are convenient for quick meals.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: I ristoranti fast food sono comodi per pasti veloci.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: Los restaurantes de comida rápida son convenientes para comidas rápidas.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Fast-Food-Restaurants sind praktisch für schnelle Mahlzeiten.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 14. Can I have some ketchup with my burger?
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Posso avere del ketchup con il mio hamburger?
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: ¿Puedo tener un poco de ketchup con mi hamburguesa?
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Kann ich etwas Ketchup zu meinem Burger haben?

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 15. Fast food is popular among young people.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Il fast food è popolare tra i giovani.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: La comida rápida es popular entre los jóvenes.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Fast Food ist bei jungen Leuten beliebt.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 16. The fast food chain opened a new location.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: La catena di fast food ha aperto una nuova sede.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: La cadena de comida rápida abrió una nueva ubicación.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Die Fast-Food-Kette hat einen neuen Standort eröffnet.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 17. I don't like the taste of fast food.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Non mi piace il sapore del fast food.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: No me gusta el sabor de la comida rápida.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Mir schmeckt Fast Food nicht.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 18. Fast food is often associated with unhealthy eating habits.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Il fast food è spesso associato ad abitudini alimentari non salutari.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: La comida rápida se asocia a menudo con hábitos alimenticios poco saludables.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Fast Food wird oft mit ungesunden Essgewohnheiten in Verbindung gebracht.

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 19. Can I get a refill on my soda, please?
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Posso avere un rabbocco per la mia bibita, per favore?
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: ¿Puedo rellenar mi refresco, por favor?
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Kann ich bitte meine Limonade nachfüllen lassen?

Fast Food Restaurant.english: 20. I prefer homemade meals over fast food.
Fast Food Restaurant.italian: Preferisco i pasti fatti in casa rispetto al fast food.
Fast Food Restaurant.spanish: Prefiero las comidas caseras en lugar de la comida rápida.
Fast Food Restaurant.german: Ich ziehe selbstgemachte Mahlzeiten Fast Food vor.
